original_title: MP Gajendrakumar slapped with travel ban
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Killinochchi Magistrate's Court issued a Travel Ban on MP Gajendrakumar Ponnambalam on Tuesday (6).

Police Spokesperson SSP Nihal Thalduwa told News 1st that the order was issued after facts were reported to court over an incident that transpired with police officers at a meeting in Jaffna recently.
Sri Lanka thrashes Afghanistan by nine wickets for 2-1 ODI series win
Harsha de Silva named Chairman of the Committee on Public Finance
